the act of putting something inside something else
something that is added to the middle of a document or piece of writing
when you add something new to a piece of writing, or the words that you add
What effect will the insertion of this clause have?
The group plans to put its views across through insertions in the daily press.
an occasion when an advertisement appears in a newspaper
The Guitarist’s Readers’ Ads service averages over five hundred separate insertions per month.
